HeightMapObject Class Reference

#include <heightmapobject.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Display a grayscale heightmap providing a range selection.

The heightmap is simply draw and a selection can be set with minSelect and maxSelect.

The selection will be highlighted between minSelect and maxSelect.
